title: Yen Bears Hold Their Ground, Undeterred by Ueda’s Rate-Hike Hint
description: Speculation is growing that the Bank of Japan is on track to raise interest rates this month but market participants are still betting that the yen will weaken against the dollar.
content: Speculation is growing that the Bank of Japan is on track to raise interest rates this month but market participants are still betting that the yen will weaken against the dollar.
